original_text:
let them sing before the Lord,
    for he comes to judge the earth.
He will judge the world in righteousness
    and the peoples with equity.
korean_text: 그가 땅을 심판하러 임하실 것임이로다 그가 의로 세계를 판단하시며 공평으로 그의 백성을 심판하시리로다

sentences.original_text: let them sing before the Lord
for he comes to judge the earth
He will judge the world in righteousness
